name: Original Bug Shirt Company Original Bug Shirt - Unisex
description: This bug-battling shirt provides a barrier between you and the midges, flies and mosquitoes, and cuts down the need for using chemical repellents.Polyester with UV protection.Loose fit, mesh sides for breathability.Adjustable zippered mesh hood has a drawstring to work with or without a hat.Adjustable wrists; drawstring with cordlock waist.Shirt folds up into its own carrying pocket.
